entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
entry.content: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: vuhuuu11/react-accordion: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.
entry.content: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.

entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: martinhollstrand/pdfnano: A lightweight, robust PDF parsing library for Node.js written in TypeScript. Extract text, images, and metadata from PDFs with no external dependencies.
entry.content: A lightweight, robust PDF parsing library for Node.js written in TypeScript. Extract text, images, and metadata from PDFs with no external dependencies.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: StarK-VisioN/Todo-App: A lightweight and responsive Todo List app built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light mode, persistent todos via localStorage, and smooth UI interactions. Deployed on Render.
entry.content: A lightweight and responsive Todo List app built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light mode, persistent todos via localStorage, and smooth UI interactions. Deployed on Render.

entry.title: anakafeel/hyprland-dotfiles: This repository contains my personal dotfiles and configuration files for customizing my Hyprland setup, a dynamic and lightweight Wayland compositor. The configurations are designed for a clean, modular, and aesthetic workflow, leveraging tools like GNU Stow for easy management and portability of dotfiles.
entry.content: This repository contains my personal dotfiles and configuration files for customizing my Hyprland setup, a dynamic and lightweight Wayland compositor. The configurations are designed for a clean, modular, and aesthetic workflow, leveraging tools like GNU Stow for easy management and portability of dotfiles.

entry.title: emberjs/data: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.
entry.content: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.

entry.content: A lightweight Chrome extension to let you add personal notes to Twitch usernames

entry.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

entry.title: abbychau/wrapped-web-components: A lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies web component creation by allowing developers to use plain HTML, JS, and CSS instead of dealing with template.innerHTML and other low-level Web Component APIs.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies web component creation by allowing developers to use plain HTML, JS, and CSS instead of dealing with template.innerHTML and other low-level Web Component APIs.

entry.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
entry.content: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
